name: AWS FinOps MCP - SSH Tunnel
description: Connect to MCP server on EC2 via SSH tunnel

setup.step1: Start SSH tunnel: ssh -i your-key.pem -L 8000:localhost:8000 ec2-user@your-ec2-ip -N
setup.step2: Keep the SSH tunnel running in a separate terminal
setup.step3: Configure your MCP client with this config
